metadata.description: This original, fast-paced tale catapults us into the seedy underworld of a country whose violent past still echoes into a fractured present. Prisoners meets The Deer Hunter. PUBLICATION IN 2 VOLUMES - COMPLETED WORK. Ex-soldier, and widower, Frank Sokol must face the ghosts of the past when he returns to his native Croatia with his Canadian-born 11-year-old son, Ben. But when Ben is kidnapped, Frank will be forced to mend deep-seated familial wounds, and resort to his military training to get him back. Nothing will prepare him for what his search for his boy will uncover...
metadata.name: Balkans Arena
